title: TVS Motor to invest in Formula 1 driver Narain Karthikeyan’s start-up ‘DriveX’
description: TVS Motor Company will be investing Rs 85.41 crore to acquire a 48.27% stake in Nkars Mobility Millennial Solutions Private Limited (NMMSPL), which operates Formula 1 Driver Narain Karthikeyan’s start-up ‘DriveX’, the company informed the exchanges on Wednesday.
